configurable.i18n_name: HIGH WAIST STRAIGHT LEG PORTLAND BLACK
configurable.i18n_name_de: HIGH WAIST STRAIGHT LEG PORTLAND BLACK
configurable.i18n_name_nl: HIGH WAIST STRAIGHT LEG PORTLAND BLACK
configurable.i18n_name_fr: HIGH WAIST STRAIGHT LEG PORTLAND BLACK

configurable.i18n_name_es: HIGH WAIST STRAIGHT LEG PORTLAND BLACK
configurable.i18n_description: The High Waist Straight Leg Portland Black is A very expensive brand’s classic and leg-lengthening women’s jean in a style-savvy modern black denim. This sophisticated style is flatteringly fitted through the hip and thigh, running parallel from the knee to the leg opening. Its true straight leg silhouette combined with the higher waist give a timeless, easy elegance. The clean Portland Black wash takes this jean to a new level of contemporary femininity while just enough stretch ensures unrivalled comfort. Team with a statement collar shirt or blouse on top for instant retro chic.
configurable.i18n_description_de: High Waist Straight Leg Portland Black ist die klassische Damenjeans von A very expensive brand mit beinstreckender Wirkung im hochaktuellen schwarzen Denim. Dieses raffinierte, an Hüfte und Oberschenkeln eng anliegende Modell verläuft vom Knie bis nach unten gerade. Die absolut gerade Linie und die höhere Leibhöhe sorgen für eine unvergängliche, easy wirkende Eleganz. Die Waschung Portland Black macht diese Jeans ganz zeitgenössisch feminin und der richtige Stretchanteil sichert einen unvergleichbaren Tragkomfort. Gestalten Sie Ihren Retro-Chic durch Kombinieren mit einer Bluse oder einem Oberteil mit wichtigem Kragen.
configurable.i18n_description_nl: De High Waist Straight Leg Portland Black is A very expensive brand’s klassieke vrouwenjeans die het been langer doet lijken in een stijlvol en modern zwart denim. Het geraffineerde model zit flatteus om heup en dijen en loopt recht uit vanaf de knie tot de pijpopening. Het silhouet met rechte pijpen en de verhoogde taille maken de jeans tijdloos en elegant. De simpele Portland Black wassing brengt deze jeans naar een nieuw niveau van bijdetijdse vrouwelijkheid, terwijl net genoeg stretch voor ongekend comfort zorgt. Draag hem met een bloes met kraag voor een retro-chique look.
configurable.i18n_description_fr: Le High Waist Straight Leg version Portland Black est le jean femme classique de A very expensive brand pour allonger la jambe, ici présenté dans un denim noir moderne très tendance. Ce style sophistiqué est ajusté sur les hanches et les cuisses pour mettre en valeur vos formes, puis tombe droit à partir du genou. Sa silhouette bien droite et sa taille rehaussée lui insufflent une élégance facile et intemporelle. Très clean, le lavage Portland Black fait entrer ce jean dans un nouveau niveau de féminité contemporaine, tandis que son élasticité justement dosée lui garantit un confort sans pareil. À associer à une chemise à col ou à une blouse au look affirmé pour un look rétro chic en un clin d'œil.
configurable.i18n_description_it: High Waist Straight Leg Portland Black è il jeans di A very expensive brand da donna, classico e che slancia la gamba, declinato in un attualissimo denim nero. Questo modello sofisticato è perfettamente fasciante su fianchi e cosce, scendendo dritto dal ginocchio in giù. La linea assolutamente dritta, combinata con la vita più alta, dona un’eleganza intramontabile e disinvolta. Il lavaggio Portland Black regala a questo jeans una femminilità molto contemporanea, mentre la giusta percentuale di stretch assicura comfort ineguagliabile. Da portare con una camicia o con una blusa dal collo importante per uno chic dall’aria retro.
configurable.i18n_description_es: The High Waist Straight Leg Portland Black is A very expensive brand’s classic and leg-lengthening women’s jean in a style-savvy modern black denim. This sophisticated style is flatteringly fitted through the hip and thigh, running parallel from the knee to the leg opening. Its true straight leg silhouette combined with the higher waist give a timeless, easy elegance. The clean Portland Black wash takes this jean to a new level of contemporary femininity while just enough stretch ensures unrivalled comfort. Team with a statement collar shirt or blouse on top for instant retro chic.

  • Rise: Front: 8in Back: 12 1/2in

  • 92.5% Cotton, 6% Polyester, 1.5% Spandex
  • A very expensive brand's signature squiggle back pocket
  • Zip fly
  • High waist
  • Made in Europe using original and handcrafted finishing techniques

configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit: The High Waist Straight Leg is a truly higher version of the Straight Leg fit. The combination of the higher rise and the traditional straight leg make this fit an all-time favourite for the more mature consumer. It is naturally available with a variety of back pocket designs, as well as the A very expensive brand signature squiggle.
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_de: Die High Waist Straight Leg ist die High-Waist Interpretation der Straight Leg Passform. Durch die höhere Leibhöhe und den klassischen geraden Beinschnitt ist diese Jeans für reifere Erwachsene in allen Momenten unverzichtbar. Es gibt sie in einer Backpockets-Designvielfalt und mit dekoriertem A very expensive brand Logo.
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_nl: De High Waist Straight Leg is letterlijk een hogere uitvoering van de Straight Leg. De combinatie van de hogere taille en de traditionele straight leg maken de jeans een favoriet bij onze rijpere liefhebbers. Hij is verkrijgbaar met een aantal nieuwe designs achterzakken en de A very expensive brand signature squiggle.
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_fr: Le High Waist Straight Leg revisite dans une version à taille résolument plus haute la coupe du Straight Leg. Sa taille plus haute et son tombé droit traditionnel en font une pièce de choix en toutes circonstances pour les consommatrices plus matures. Naturellement disponible dans divers modèles de poches arrière, il affiche le logo emblématique de A very expensive brand.
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_it: High Waist Straight Leg è la rivisitazione a vita decisamente più alta dello Straight Leg. La vita alta assieme alla classica gamba dritta, che lo rendono adatto in ogni occasione, incontrano il gusto della donna più matura. Disponibile naturalmente in diversi modelli di tasche posteriori, porta il logo decorato di A very expensive brand.
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_es: The High Waist Straight Leg is a truly higher version of the Straight Leg fit. The combination of the higher rise and the traditional straight leg make this fit an all-time favourite for the more mature consumer. It is naturally available with a variety of back pocket designs, as well as the A very expensive brand signature squiggle.
